title: How to Change Poshmark Username on an iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Go to https://www.poshmark.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.poshmark.com in a web browser. Since there's no option to change your username in the Poshmark mobile app, you'll need to access the website in a web browser like Safari. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Log in.
steps.content: Tap Log in . It's near the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Sign in to your Poshmark account.
steps.content: Sign in to your Poshmark account. Depending on how you signed up for Poshmark, you may log in with Facebook, Google, or a username and password.

steps.title: Tap your profile photo.
steps.content: Tap your profile photo. It's at the top-right corner of the page. A menu will expand. If you don't see these options or steps, you may need to request the desktop site .

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Account Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Account Settings . It's toward the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Account Info.
steps.content: Tap Account Info . It's near the top of the menu. This displays all of the account information that can be changed, including your username.

steps.title: Tap Change next to "Username."
steps.content: Tap Change next to "Username." It's the first option near the top of the page. This prompts Poshmark to send you a verification message via email. A "Verify" pop-up window also appears.

steps.title: Copy the verification code from the email.
steps.content: Copy the verification code from the email. Open the email message from Poshmark to find the 6-digit verification code. To copy the code, tap and hold it until a menu appears, and then tap Copy on the menu.

steps.title: Paste the copied code into the Verification pop-up.
steps.content: Paste the copied code into the Verification pop-up. To do this, tap and hold the "Enter Verification Code" screen until the menu appears, and then tap Paste .

steps.title: Tap Done to verify.
steps.content: Tap Done to verify. It's the blue button at the bottom of the screen. You can now change your username.

steps.title: Type a username into the "New Username" blank.
steps.content: Type a username into the "New Username" blank. It's below your current username. You can only change your username two times, so be sure to choose something you'll want to keep.

steps.title: Tap Done to save your changes.
steps.content: Tap Done to save your changes. Your new username will take effect immediately. Any @mentions to your old username will remain tied to that username.
